item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:17:01 UTC – Details)



Sturdy strawberries: 2 pack 33 feet 50 led fairy lights with 7.8 inch lights spacing, sufficient length for long distance lighting, just plug in and light up your daily life; impact resistant, shatterproof and break resistant led bulbs can withstand careless dropping; not cracking even stepping on it; a great gift for families, friends or relatives
50 sets connectable: Easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary; up to 50 strands connectable to maximize your need for larger area lighting and festival decorations, 3.9 inches end cord with key designed female connector for quick access and easy connection
Replacement lights and fuse: 2 spare led bulbs and 2 spare fuses for replacement included, take off the led shade, pull out the damaged led bulb from bulb seat, plug in a new one with proper force and put back the shade; slide out the fuse chamber cover toward two blades and take out the burnt out one, install the new one correctly and close the cover; plug in and try working
Unexpected occasions: It is fabulous for Christmas, home, roof, garden, patio, balcony, porch, hallway, fence, shelf, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party, note:The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from rainy day
Notes and reminders: 1. Before replacing bulbs, unplug the lights from AC outlet or switch off the Christmas lights string 2. Keep it away from children, kids or toddlers and store them out of their reach 3. Replace with same type bulb

Dimmable and energy saving: G40 outside porch string light come with 25*2 clear edison g40 bulbs and 2 spare replacement bulb. 1.56 inch light bulbs have e12 or c7 candelabra socket base, 5W per bulb, help you to save more electricity bill. Cute bulbs are dimmer compatible, creating a warm and romantic atmosphere that will make you feel relaxed and happy
Connectable and portable outdoor lights: 25*2 hanging sockets, 6 inch lead with male plug, 12 inch spacing between bulbs, 6 inch tail with female connector, total length 25 feet. End to end connect up to 3 strands. Portable size for easy carrying and storage
Safety and durable: UL certified deck lights is built with weatherproof technology, which can withstand extreme temperatures, rain, wind, and damp climates. Safe and durable electric bistro lights either with a built-in spare fuse for easy replacement
Practical and easy to install: This outdoor decorative light string is very easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere as you need. flexible and practical, a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulbs, for its vintage style light string, please search B07W59GM6J
Widely used: Our commercial lights are the perfect decoration for balcony terrace, garden, Bistro, pergola, gazebo, tent, barbecue, city roof, market, cafe, umbrella, dinner, wedding, birthday, party etc. For Bulbs replacement, please search B00R25V92Y

Product Description

Christmas Green Wire Net String Lights

29V low-voltage plug (lower than the specified human safety voltage) keeps the LED light in a low-temperature state for long-term use.

The net lights with 8 light modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, by pressing the button on the plug to change the mode.

The Christmas net light are super bright, can be used for outdoor decoration, including Christmas, Halloween, wedding, parties, garden, gate, yard, backyard, patio, pet house and so on.

Specification: Color: Multi-Colored LED Quantity: 360 LED Size: 12 ft x 5 ft Leading Wire: 16.5 ft Wire Color: Green IP44 Waterproof Power Source: Adapter Powered 8 Lighting Modes

String Length:
17 FT 17 FT 17 FT 17 FT 12 FT x 5 FT 12 FT x 5 FT

50 LED 50 LED 50 LED 50 LED 360 LED 360 LED

Warm White Multi-Colored Warm White Multi-Colored Warm White Multi-Colored

Warm White Multi-Colored Blue Red Green Warm White

Power Supply:
Plug in Plug in Plug in Plug in Plug in Plug in

IP44 Waterproof & Safety: Our net lights outdoor are waterproof (IP44), rain and snow resistant. Perfect for outdoor Christmas decoration. No need to worry about bad weather. Note: The adaptor is not waterproof, please keep it in a dry place. 29V low-voltage plug (lower than the specified human safety voltage) keeps the LED light in a low-temperature state for long-term use.
8 Lighting Modes: This Christmas lights have 8 different lighting modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, steady on. Choose the lighting style to satisfy your different needs on different occasions with just a press of a button.
Connectable Mesh Lights: Our 12ft x 5ft net mesh lights with male and female safety plugs can be connected end-to-end, it could be connected to up to 3 sets, enough to cover any outdoor Christmas scene you want to decorate, help you create a romantic and warm atmosphere.
Widely Use: Bush net string lights perfect for Christmas decorations, home, garden, wall, window, Christmas, party, wedding etc, also great for Christmas, party, Valentine’s day, wedding, home, window, Thanksgiving Day, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building decoration to decorate your party or festival, enjoy the happy atmosphere.

Christmas Green Wire Net String Lights

  • 29V low-voltage plug (lower than the specified human safety voltage) keeps the LED light in a low-temperature state for long-term use.

  • The net lights with 8 light modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, by pressing the button on the plug to change the mode.

  • The Christmas net light are super bright, can be used for outdoor decoration, including Christmas, Halloween, wedding, parties, garden, gate, yard, backyard, patio, pet house and so on.

From the brand

Light Up Your Life

Hot Sale Icicle Lights

Popular String Lights

Classic Christmas Mini Lights

CLuster Lights Christmas Tree

Christmas Icicle Lights

【 Energy Saving & Safe to Use】These UL588-listed icicle outdoor lights come with a 29V low voltage plug, offer up to 90% in energy savings than traditional incandescent lights and ensure the max safety. This means children, and pets are safe to touch the hanging Christmas lights. More safety and less power consumption.
【8 Modes with Remote & Memory 】Our LED icicle string lights offer 8 different lighting modes for you to choose from (Steady on, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing Flash, Fade, Twinkling Flash, and Combination). And thanks to the built-in memory chip, our fairy icicle lights will save your last time lights setting.
【4 Brightness levels & 3 Timer Function】4 Brightness level: 100%-75%-50%-25%; 3 Timer Function: 6H on, 18H off/ 8H on, 16H off/ 6H on, 6H off, 3H on, 9H off. You can adjust Christmas lights for the house by remote easily, and choose one favorite mode to enhance the Christmas spirit.
【IP44 Waterproof 】The Waterproof Christmas string lights are designed to withstand light rain or water spills, making them perfect for both indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations even on rainy or snowy days, like eave, patio, stair, gazebo, fence, trees, roof awnings, or even hung on the wall of your bedroom.

Ollny Christmas Icicle Lights Decorate Your Life!

You can adjust modes/dimmable/times by remote easily. Choose one favorite mode to create your lively Christmas atmosphere. Connected led Christmas lights can be controlled by one remote. For 720LED 60FT long Icicle Lights, we recommend connecting only 2 sets to ensure the lighting effect.

Package included

1x 720LED Multicolor Icicle Lights

1x Remote

1x UL Plug

1x Controller

1x Manual

Specification

LED Qty: 720LED, total 120 drops

Light Length: 60ft

Lead Cable: 16.4ft

Wire Color: Clear White

Material: Copper+Plastic

Connectable: Max of 3 Set

Rated Voltage: 29V Safe Plug In

Read more

IP44 Waterproof

Effectively block rainwater from entering. Make Christmas string lights not only be used indoors but also outdoor usage even on rainy, snowy, or storm days.

Safe to Touch

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.

Memory Function

A built-in memory chip will save your last mode settings. There is no need to reset the mode each day.

Read more

Installation

These icicle lights were neatly packed, which makes it easy to unpack them without creating a tangle. Please kindly hang the main string of lights first, then unwrap the individual strings to avoid tangling.

Warm White Christmas C7 String Lights Set of 100 C7 Bulbs Indoor / Outdoor
Our C7 Christmas Lights create a fun, unique look when decorating for any special occasion. Perfect for weddings, parties, tents, patios, awnings and Christmas decoration. These bulbs will screw into a socket and last for 3000 hours.
Add an inviting glow to your space with the Weather Resistant String of Clear C7 Bulb Lights. These lights are perfect for weddings, birthday parties, and other gatherings. These are ideal for adding a cozy atmosphere, or a charming and festive accent, to a casual evening under the stars.

SPECS
Bulb Count: 100
Bulb Spacing: 12 in.
Diameter of Bulb: 1 in.
Bulb & Socket Type: C7 w/ a C7 / E12 base
Total Length (end to end): 100 ft
UL Listed for Indoor & Outdoor Use.
100 Lights Included: C7 E12 Base Light sockets, 5 watts per bulb
One bulb goes out will not affect other bulbs; built in fuse for safety and the electrical plug contains a spare fuse; UL listed. Perfect for Outside Christmas Garden Patio Yard Cafe Tent Porch Deck Party Backyard Decoration
Long Lasting Life: 5W 120V bulbs last for 3000 hours
100FT Long: 12″ spacing between bulbs, 6″ lead on both ends
For Installation, always mount the string first before screwing in the light bulbs. For replacement bulbs, please search for ASIN#B07W4915SZ.

The strand features 20 icicles with 100 total LED lights. The 10 long icicles have 6 lights and the 10 short ones have 4. It allows you to vary your eye-catching Christmas lights display to keep you excited and your guests dazzled.
FUNCTION & TIMER: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slow-glow, Chasing/flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/flash, Steady on total 8 modes. Build in timer and memory function let the icicle lights automatically turn on and off (6hrs on, 18hrs off) and no need to reset every day.
Christmas Decor Dimension: These static lights are mains operated with a discreet clear cable at a total length of approximately 16 ft, and with 1 ft between each bulb. Long ice cone: 12”, short ice cone: 8”. End-to-end plugs let you connect up to 4 strings together.
Wide Applications: The Christmas icicle lights features a realistic look with durable material. Decor it on your gutters, roof lines, fences, porch railings, garages or trees to create the ideal festive front or back garden.
Ideal Christmas Gift: Turn your home into a winter wonderland with these Christmas dripping icicle Lights. Celebrate the season with an eye-catching holiday display when you decorate with classic clear or festive cool white Christmas lights!

C9 LED ENERGY SAVING

Energy efficient LED bulbs reduce power needs by up to 90%. Excellent heat dissipation and flicker free lighting than incandescent string lights; long lifespan up to 50,000 hours.

SAFETY UL LISTED GUARANTY

IP44 waterproof level & UL Listed for outdoor & indoor use; Bulbs are virtually unbreakable, and colors never fade, chip or crack. The colorful Christams lights and a strong Christmas atmosphere will be the envy to your neighbor.

CHRISTMAS PATHWAY MARKER LIGHTS

C9 Traditional Christmas lights outdoor decorations lawn lights pathway lights imbue happiness and an exciting Christmas for your friends and families.!Keep Christmas spirit going well by illuminating your life.

【Safety Convenient & Practical】： 6″ lead with male plug, 12″ spacing between LED multicolor bulbs, 6″ tail with female connector.The male plug contains a spare fuse. 0.6Watt/Bulbs (totals 8bulbs).Each set LED multicolor Christmas pathway stake lights outdoor 2.4 watts, can connect up to 180 sets holiday pathway string lights(Max 432 watts) plug in and enjoy it.
【IP44 Water-Resistant】：Christmas Walkway outdoor decorations string lights , commercial-strength casing withstands extreme temperatures and wet weather. Keep the string lights plug as dry as possible.If a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulb.
【Multi-Function Atmosphere】：C9 Christmas lawn decorations pathway markers stakes lights easy to installation.shatterproof and IP44 waterproof, Fits great for patio, backyard, deck, bistro, café, pergola, garden, market, wedding party, Christmas decoration and many other occasions or events.
